A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie kept me smiling from beginning to end. I've seen it twice now and I loved it both times. I won't go incredibly in depth\, because this is my opinion\, but it felt like a true Star Wars experience. I love where Rian Johnson took us in this cinematic adventure\, and I can't wait to see how J.J. Abrams pulls it all together in the next movie. As for fans that are disappointed\, the series isn't over yet.
